arts.ttl: 'Pelach knew what we were trying to do' - Norwich fans react to Stoke draw
arts.sum: Watch Norwich City fans react to the Canaries' 1-1 Championship draw with Stoke City at the Bet365 Stadium.

arts.ttl: Stoke City player ratings v Norwich as Manhoef strikes and Johansson delights - Joseph Chapman - Stoke-on-Trent Live
arts.sum: The second half was a goalless affair, but entertaining nonetheless; Stoke might've won it, through half chances generated by the likes of Moran and Koumas, and if Manhoef had measured his pass on the breakaway better when the hosts sought to hit back from a Canary corner, it might've been all three points for Narcis Pelach's men - at the hands of his old employers. Manhoef curled home on the stroke of half time, only two minutes before Ante Crnac had rattled the Canaries in front, finally breaching Viktor Johansson's goal who, until then, had performed impressively to keep the visitors at bay.

arts.ttl: Paddy's Pointers: Four observations after Norwich's Stoke stalemate
arts.sum: Paddy Davitt delivers his Stoke verdict after the Canaries 1-1 Championship draw.

arts.ttl: Narcis Pelach helps Stoke take point from former club Norwich
arts.sum: Million Manhoef cancelled out Ante Crnac’s opener for the Canaries.

arts.ttl: Stoke City suffer another injury scare in first half of Norwich City clash
arts.sum: Norwich themselves were forced into a first half change when the dangerous Marcelino Nunez was also unable to continue after treatment, clutching his leg and moving gingerly akin to Burger. Shortly after the restart, Burger - who had helped to create a couple of early openings in the game - went to ground in the centre circle and received treatment.

arts.ttl: MATCHDAY LIVE: Stoke City v Norwich City
arts.sum: Follow live updates of Norwich City's Championship clash away at Stoke City via our matchday blog.

arts.ttl: Narcis Pelach drops January transfer hint after Stoke City squad audit
arts.sum: Narcis Pelach is already looking ahead to the possibilities that the January transfer window has in store for Stoke City as he gets up to speed with the existing tools at his disposal. Pelach took over the reins from Steven Schumacher last month; Schumacher had worked with sporting director Jon Walters in the summer to reshape the squad he himself had inherited from Alex Neil.

arts.ttl: Norwich announce lower loss of £14.4m for 2023-24
arts.sum: Norwich City announce a pre-tax loss of £14.4m for the year ending June 2024 amid a period of unprecedented change on and off the pitch.

arts.ttl: Gibbo's debt to Norwich ahead of Stoke reunion
arts.sum: Former Canaries defender Ben Gibson has reflected on a special time on and off the pitch ahead of a Stoke City Championship reunion

arts.ttl: 'No coach knows Sainz better than me' - Stoke boss Pelach on Norwich star man
arts.sum: Stoke City boss Narcis Pelach has a plan to halt Norwich City's Borja Sainz's when he comes up against his former colleague this weekend.
